jobDescription: Principal Data Scientist  If you are a Principal Data Scientist with experience, please read on!  We are a cutting edge technology company dominating the IoT (Internet of Things) market where we solve real world problems in real-time for our clients. We connect entire ecosystems creating digital enterprises. Due to growth and demand for our product and services, we are in need of hiring a Principal Data Scientist who has experience and passion for driving teams to exceptional while being hands-on with a product focused mind set. We are looking for a talented individual who has Machine Learning, NLP, and AI experience as well as expertise with Python, R, Java, or full stack development.  If you are interested in joining a leading technology company that cares about its employees and their environment, then apply immediately. Top Reasons to Work with Us
